00156         {
00157             try
00158             {

00178         private void LoadFile()
00179         {
00180             try
00181             {
00182                 _FileContents = new Dictionary<string, Dictionary<string, string>>();
00183                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(this.FileName))
00184                     return;
00185 
00186                 string Contents = FileManager.GetFileContents(FileName);
00187                 Regex Section = new Regex("[" + Regex.Escape(" ") + "\t]*" + Regex.Escape("[") + ".*" + Regex.Escape("]\r\n"));
00188                 string[] Sections = Section.Split(Contents);
00189                 MatchCollection SectionHeaders = Section.Matches(Contents);
00190                 int Counter = 1;
00191                 foreach (Match SectionHeader in SectionHeaders)
00192                 {
00193                     string[] Splitter = { "\r\n" };
00194                     string[] Splitter2 = { "=" };
00195                     string[] Items = Sections[Counter].Split(Splitter, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);
00196                     Dictionary<string, string> SectionValues = new Dictionary<string, string>();
00197                     foreach (string Item in Items)
00198                     {
00199                         SectionValues.Add(Item.Split(Splitter2, StringSplitOptions.None)[0], Item.Split(Splitter2, StringSplitOptions.None)[1]);
00200                     }
00201                     _FileContents.Add(SectionHeader.Value.Replace("[", "").Replace("]\r\n", ""), SectionValues);
00202                     ++Counter;
00203                 }
00204             }
00205             catch { throw; }
00206         }
